title: Facebook Soars, Disney Delivers
description: Facebook and Visa hit new highs. Disney's theme parks deliver while TripAdvisor loses some altitude. Our analysts discuss those stories and weigh in on stronger-than-expected jobs numbers. Plus, Motley Fool columnist Morgan Housel talks market volatility and shares some fatherly financial advice.

Our analysts discuss those stories and weigh in on stronger-than-expected jobs numbers. Plus, Motley Fool columnist Morgan Housel talks market volatility and shares some fatherly financial advice.
